value.fullName: Confident in my decision: I know where I will be attending college after my Verto semester(s). I've been accepted to the institution and feel confident in my choice.
value.label: Confident in my decision: I know where I will be attending college after my Verto semester(s). I've been accepted to the institution and feel confident in my choice.

value.fullName: Open to options: I have a few institutions in mind, or have received some college acceptances, but I am open to exploring my college options further.
value.label: Open to options: I have a few institutions in mind, or have received some college acceptances, but I am open to exploring my college options further.

value.fullName: Need guidance: I don't know where to start or what to look for in potential colleges or universities.
value.label: Need guidance: I don't know where to start or what to look for in potential colleges or universities.

value.fullName: I don't plan to attend college after my Verto semester(s).
value.label: I don't plan to attend college after my Verto semester(s).
